indexes.indexdef: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX audit_logs_pkey ON public.audit_logs USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_audit_logs_user ON public.audit_logs USING btree (user_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_audit_logs_action ON public.audit_logs USING btree (action)
CREATE INDEX idx_audit_logs_created ON public.audit_logs USING btree (created_at DESC)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX bookings_pkey ON public.bookings USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX bookings_booking_number_key ON public.bookings USING btree (booking_number)
CREATE INDEX idx_bookings_farmer ON public.bookings USING btree (farmer_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_bookings_vehicle ON public.bookings USING btree (vehicle_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_bookings_owner ON public.bookings USING btree (owner_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_bookings_status ON public.bookings USING btree (status)
CREATE INDEX idx_bookings_payment_status ON public.bookings USING btree (payment_status)
CREATE INDEX idx_bookings_dates ON public.bookings USING btree (start_date, end_date)
CREATE INDEX idx_bookings_number ON public.bookings USING btree (booking_number)
CREATE INDEX idx_bookings_service_type ON public.bookings USING btree (service_type)
CREATE INDEX idx_bookings_farmer_location ON public.bookings USING btree (farmer_location_lat, farmer_location_lng)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX earnings_pkey ON public.earnings USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_earnings_owner ON public.earnings USING btree (owner_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_earnings_booking ON public.earnings USING btree (booking_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_earnings_status ON public.earnings USING btree (status)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX notifications_pkey ON public.notifications USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_user ON public.notifications USING btree (user_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_read ON public.notifications USING btree (is_read)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_created ON public.notifications USING btree (created_at DESC)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX payments_pkey ON public.payments USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX payments_payment_id_key ON public.payments USING btree (payment_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_payments_booking ON public.payments USING btree (booking_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_payments_user ON public.payments USING btree (user_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_payments_status ON public.payments USING btree (status)
CREATE INDEX idx_payments_payment_id ON public.payments USING btree (payment_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_payments_transaction ON public.payments USING btree (transaction_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_payments_gateway ON public.payments USING btree (payment_gateway)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX reviews_pkey ON public.reviews USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX reviews_booking_id_key ON public.reviews USING btree (booking_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_reviews_vehicle ON public.reviews USING btree (vehicle_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_reviews_rating ON public.reviews USING btree (rating)
CREATE INDEX idx_reviews_booking ON public.reviews USING btree (booking_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX sessions_pkey ON public.sessions USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX sessions_refresh_token_key ON public.sessions USING btree (refresh_token)
CREATE INDEX idx_sessions_user ON public.sessions USING btree (user_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_sessions_token ON public.sessions USING btree (refresh_token)
CREATE INDEX idx_sessions_expires ON public.sessions USING btree (expires_at)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_pkey ON public.users USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_phone_number_key ON public.users USING btree (phone_number)
CREATE INDEX idx_users_role ON public.users USING btree (role)
CREATE INDEX idx_users_active ON public.users USING btree (is_active)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_users_email_unique ON public.users USING btree (email) WHERE (email IS NOT NULL)
CREATE INDEX idx_users_phone_verified ON public.users USING btree (phone_verified)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_users_phone_unique ON public.users USING btree (phone_number)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX vehicles_pkey ON public.vehicles USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX vehicles_registration_number_key ON public.vehicles USING btree (registration_number)
CREATE INDEX idx_vehicles_owner ON public.vehicles USING btree (owner_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_vehicles_type ON public.vehicles USING btree (type)
CREATE INDEX idx_vehicles_available ON public.vehicles USING btree (is_available)
CREATE INDEX idx_vehicles_location ON public.vehicles USING gin (location)
CREATE INDEX idx_vehicles_service_radius ON public.vehicles USING btree (service_radius_km)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX wallet_transactions_pkey ON public.wallet_transactions USING btree (id)

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX wallets_user_id_key ON public.wallets USING btree (user_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_wallets_user ON public.wallets USING btree (user_id)
